p: Vegetable oils (argan and clove oils) with antioxidant and antimicrobial activities were chosen and were purchased from the Fares SA (Orastie, Romania) and Herbavit SA (Oradea, Romania) companies, respectively. The phenol content of the oils were 1.16 mg GAE/g DW (gallic acid equivalents/dry weight) for the clove oil and 0.02 mg GAE/g DW for the argan oil.
